name: csgo_observer_overlay_v2
description: Remake of UF CSGO Observer Overlay

scripts.build: npm run backend:build && npm run frontend:build
scripts.install: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build-gui: cd gui/src && javac -source 15 -target 15 Main.java && jar cfm .\Main.jar .\manifest.txt *.class
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run lint" "cd backend && npm run lint"
scripts.lint-fix: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run lint-fix" "cd backend && npm run lint-fix"

author: Zachary Tyson
